name: Osprey Syncro 12 Pack - Unisex
description: Stay cool long after you drop in. The comfortable Syncro 12 has a suspended mesh trampoline back panel to boost air flow as you ride. In fact, it’s Osprey's most breathable bike pack. It has bike-specific organization, an internal reservoir sleeve and a rain cover. Bonus: the LidLock system holds your helmet when you’re walking or hosing down your bike post-ride.Wire-tensioned mesh panel suspension system holds the pack away from your back to let air rush in and keep you cool.Ventilated foam winged shoulder straps and hip fins provide stable and breathable carrying.Deep zippered opening gives you easy access to the main compartment.Front organizer pocket opens wide so you can grab tools, tubes and pumps from their dedicated sleeves.Zippered top pocket has a soft lining to protect your sunnies.Dedicated hydration compartment holds the included Hydraulics LT 2.5L reservoir with quick-connect attachment for easy filling. A magnetic clip keeps the bite valve tethered to your shoulder strap.Low-profile helmet carry attachment slips through your helmet's vents to hold it securely in place.Reflective details and a loop for a blinky light keep you visible on after-dark missions.Includes a custom-fit rain cover that stows away in a dedicated pocket at the bottom of the pack.
